title: 100 % battery gets drained in my pixel in an hour
content:
Ever since android 10 came here, the batter has started draining super fast, it reaches 30% after an hour of usage, and *crashes*, (doesn't go to sleep, just crashes) at around 25% and my google assistant says no issues

Have tried uninstalling every app, rebooting it again, going to systems settings, everything, but nothing worked
